```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(data.table, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(igraph, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
```

`taxa` is the look-up table for the OTUs.  `cooccurrence_data` contains pairwise Spearman correlation ranks for pairs of OTUs.

```{r read_data}
taxa <- data.table(read.delim("./data/bacteria-yeast/bacteria_yeast_classified_otus"));colnames(taxa)<-c("OTU",colnames(taxa[,-1]))

head(taxa)

cooccurrence_data <- data.table(read.table("./data/bacteria-yeast/bacteria_yeast_cooccurrence", 
                                    col.names = c("treatment", "OTU_1", "OTU_2", "rho", "p")))

head(cooccurrence_data)
```
